channels.name: server-announcements
channels.description: Important updates, events, and changes related to the server

channels.description: Introduce yourself to the circular economy community! Share your background and interests

channels.description: Open discussions about anything related to the circular economy

channels.description: Latest news, trends, and happenings in the circular economy industry

channels.description: Discussions about designing products and services for circularity and environmental sustainability

channels.description: Share and discuss information about selecting sustainable and recyclable materials

channels.description: Discussions about designing products for easy disassembly, repair, and recycling

channels.name: product-as-a-service
channels.description: Discussions about implementing product-as-a-service models for circularity

channels.description: Share and discuss information about sharing economy platforms and their role in the circular economy

channels.name: remanufacturing
channels.description: Discussions about remanufacturing strategies and best practices

channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for implementing circular procurement policies and practices

channels.name: reverse-logistics
channels.description: Discussions about reverse logistics and closed-loop supply chains

channels.name: recycling-technologies
channels.description: Discussions about advanced recycling technologies and innovations

channels.name: waste-management
channels.description: Share and discuss information about sustainable waste management practices

channels.name: urban-mining
channels.description: Discussions about urban mining and recovering valuable materials from waste streams

channels.name: industrial-symbiosis
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for fostering industrial symbiosis and resource exchange

channels.name: bio-based-materials
channels.description: Discussions about the use of bio-based and biodegradable materials in the circular economy

channels.name: extended-producer-responsibility

channels.name: job-opportunities
channels.description: Post and discuss job openings, internships, and collaboration opportunities in the circular economy

channels.name: resource-sharing
channels.description: Share and exchange useful resources, tools, and materials for circular economy research and implementation

channels.name: role-assignments
channels.description: Assign roles to users based on their interests, expertise, or specialization

channels.name: bot-commands
